🍅 Pomodoro ⏱ Timer 🔔 Reminder
How it works
STEP 1 ✎ Pick a task
STEP 2 ⌛ Set your timer for 25 minutes
STEP 3 👨‍💻 Focus on a single task until the timer rings
STEP 4 ☕️ Take a 5 minute break
STEP 5 🌳 Every 4 Pomodoro’s, take a longer 15-30 break

 Key Features:
- 🍅 Pomodoro Timer: Stay focused and get more things done.
- ⏯️ Pause and resume Pomodoro
- ⏱ Customizable Pomodoro/breaks lengths
- 🔔 Notification before the end of a Pomodoro
- ☕ Support for short and long breaks
- ⏭️ Skip a break after the end of a Pomodoro
- 🎵 Focus Timer finished alarm.

Website: https://pomodoro11.vercel.app
Source code:  https://github.com/AliakseiHryhoryeu/pomodoro
